name: @i4mi/mhealth-proto-components
description: Library of Quasar Components and Utils that are useful for developing web applications for the EPD Playground.
author: Gabriel Hess, Joshua Drewlow, Alex Fahrni: medinf.i4mi@bfh.ch

scripts.build:copy: npm run build && cp -R lib src
scripts.publish: rm -r -f node_modules && npm i && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:beta: rm -r -f node_modules && npm i && npm run build && npm publish --access public --tag beta
